alert.note: Alert for Eastern Highland; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 11:23PM EST until December 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain likely with occasional freezing drizzle. Snow and sleet can also mix in. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Most likely ice accumulation will be above 2000 feet. Snow accumulations less than one inch. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. Plan on slippery road conditions. Road conditions could change between wet and icy due to localized temperature differences.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
